rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment contains neutral economic projections and descriptions.
The segment reports on financial/trade metrics ('produce up to 14.9 million tons', 'up to 15.35 million tons', 'annual output increase'), which are Neutral.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports positive economic facts without explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation or statement of uncertainty/low risk.
The segment states Brazil will produce a certain amount, describing a future possibility/economic outcome.
